projects.title: Arduino ArtNet Node
projects.description: An Arduino-based ethernet to DMX converted, allowing me to control entertainment lighting systems from my laptop
projects.long_description: An Arduino-based ethernet to DMX converted, allowing me to control entertainment lighting systems from my laptop, supporting 2 seperate addressable universes with 5-pin and 3-pin XLR output. Settings can be changed via a web UI, and the node has been tested as fully working with both ETC Nomad and QLC+.

projects.title: Door Sign
projects.description: A sign for my bedroom door that shows what's currently happening in my calendar, based off a Spark Core and a Â£5 display from eBay.

projects.title: Atomos Ninja 2 EVF
projects.description: While filming Polaroid, I found the screen of the Ninja 2 too shiny to see properly outside, so I designed and 3D-printed an eyepiece for it. You can download and modify it from the Thingiverse page, under a CC-BY-SA license.
